items[0].content: With automatic, always-on protection, you can put attacks out in less than 10 seconds before they even get fully started.
items[0].title: Always-On CDN Protection

items[1].content: Stop even the most sophisticated attacks with an AI-powered smart request filter that automatically adapts to your traffic.
items[1].title: Dynamic AI Request Filter

items[2].content: Minimize false positive detections and stop infuriating your users with a smart false positive avoidance system.
items[2].title: False Positives Avoidance

features2.subTitle: Stop DDoS attacks in their tracks before they even start causing damage.
features2.title: No more downtime. Ever.

goFaster.subTitle: Protect against all types of threats with a single platform.

tabs[0].content: Stop malicious bots or DDoS scripts from overloading your server. Gowaf helps you stay safe by automatically detecting and blocking malicious HTTP requests using a continuously learning AI security system. We stop threats seconds before they ever reach your origin.
tabs[0].title: Protect against Layer 7 HTTP flood attacks

tabs[1].content: Ensure uninterrupted content delivery with a massive 150 Tbps  global network that automatically blocks even the largest volumetric attacks right on the edge before hitting your server. Gowaf helps you keep your server safe and your users engaged. No matter what.
tabs[1].title: Block volumetric network attacks on the edge

tabs[2].content: Block malicious requests targeting your applications on the software layer. Gowaf WAF helps you stay safe by blocking common security vulnerabilities and a real-time critical response rule-set maintained by the Gowaf Security team to stay on top of new threats.
tabs[2].title: Protect your applications with Gowaf WAF

tabs[3].content: Protect your online presence and stop bandwidth consumption attacks with simple configurable requests and network limits. You can easily limit the number of connections per IP, requests per second, download speed limits, and the total monthly traffic to stay in full control of your budget.
tabs[3].title: Set request and throughput limits with just a few clicks

goFaster.title: Security everywhere you need it
